(1855x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 1855. (1855x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 2783. (1855x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 79. (1855x27+19)/8 mod 1024 = 119. (1855x81+65)/16 mod 512 = 179. (1855x243+211)/32 mod 256 = 13. (1855x729+665)/64 mod 128 = 20. (1855x729+665)/128 mod 64 = 10. (1855x729+665)/256 mod 32 = 5. (1855x2187+2251)/512 mod 16 = 8. (1855x2187+2251)/1024 mod 8 = 4. (1855x2187+2251)/2048 mod 4 = 2. (1855x2187+2251)/4096 mod 2 = 1. (1855x6561+10849)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
